Yonghyun Chung, Jeong-Sul Son, Tae Jong Lee, Hee Joon Kim and Changsoo Shin

Geophysical Prospecting (2014)

PDF

1. We propose a fully three-dimensional edge-finite-element algorithm for simulating CSEM survey.

2. We compare the performance between direct and iterative solvers.

3. The results show the superior efficiency of direct solvers, particularly for multisource problems.
